website_summaries.verdict: A great case that offers a lot of protection and some nice extras. This is a great budget-friendly option for those looking to really protect their iPad Mini.
pros: Anti-slip silicone outer layer protects against bumps and drops
Comes with a kick stand, screen protector, and stylus
cons: While buyers appreciated the added screen protector, many noted that it was a little flimsy and some opted not to use it at all

customer_reviews.title: What a letdown
customer_reviews.text: This is a very bad case. I thought it had a build in screen protector but it does not. It comes with a very thin cheap looking "screen protector" but it doesn't seem like it would protect very good. Also the kickstand was another thing I was excited about but yet, that brought much disappointment also. The ipad sits way too low when propped up. Needless to say I will be sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Chrwmcayke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice durable case
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about this case but I am very glad I bought it. The bumper case completely protects the iPad it protects and it secures and protects the frame. It comes with very good instructions and it took a minute to figure out but it was relatively easy. The only thing that I believe needs a little improvement is the stand. The stand in the back is a little tough to pry out and it seems a little flimsy (not entirely sturdy). Otherwise, I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Veronic A.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited about his new case. But after just shy of 2 weeks it cracked by the home button on his ipad mini. It still holds up, but I am disappointed that they claim it is so rugged and it is not. Plus the plastic on the back, the tabs don't go in AT ALL to where they are supposed to, so he constantly fidgets with them. I'm just waiting for one or more of them to get ripped off of there by him.
customer_reviews.author: lljebj

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's been several months now, and the Topsky is still in great condition. Tiny, tiny complaint. The stand works fantastic in portrait mode, but seems to be a lttle unbalanced in landscape. For me, if it's on a soft surface and I'm watching a movie, tv, etc., it'll fall over. Even on a hard surface, the slightest touch blows it down. Tiny complaint, doesn't affect me often. Sturdy build, tough case.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Dale

customer_reviews.title: Tough case, great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Very easy to put together and very tough. Dropped my iPad from 3' with no damage to device and only some scuffs to the case.
customer_reviews.author: C. Little

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money, the outer rubber flaps don't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case mainly for the price point. It appeared to offer good protection for the money. The reviews were overall good, so I bought it. It was easy enough to assemble. I only have one complaint and it's a big one. The rubber that wraps around for protection is flimsy and doesn't stay in place very well. It pulls away from the back of the tablet case. I actually took the case off and will only use it for road trips. I bought a cheap silicon style gel slip on case. I'm actually happier with that minimalistic case.
customer_reviews.author: Trailrazer

customer_reviews.title: Good price & quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Used on my Apple mini IPad first generation. Easy to install. It goes together as a lot of other manufactures products. Very common assembly. The rubber on outside is soft and keeps the iPad from getting damaged if dropped. Comfortable grip. Won’t easily slip from hands.
customer_reviews.author: Wyldwestaz

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: This case keeps my the family iPad safe. My son has dropped our iPad onto every surface imaginable in the year we’ve had it (takes after me). The iPad has been protected and still looks bran new outside of the case. This will make it thicker, which is a benefit to be held by young hands. Also this does have some weight to it, but it grips easily and is incredibly rugged.
customer_reviews.author: J Buys Things and Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I normally avoid products like this and that's my mistake. This is an incredibly well made product. I dropped my iPad in this case three times over the span of 5 minutes unintentionally and from quite a height about 6-10 ft off ground and no scratches, breaks cracks.
customer_reviews.author: STARCAN

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy🚨🚨🚨🚨
customer_reviews.text: Gave them 1 star cause i couldn’t give them 0 I would not recommend this product the case is rubber and always falling off. Doesn’t fit snug on the iPads and on day 3 it ripped and they lie about the warranty after emailing them over 4 times and they kept giving excuses about sending it i just gave up and bought my son another case but not from them money wasted
customer_reviews.author: Rj&Kayce_mommy

customer_reviews.title: This doesn’t come with the screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what people are complaining about the back being floppy. Mine fits like a glove and feels safer. Not like I’m holding a Faberge’ egg. Only complaint is, I thought it came with a screen protector but it didn’t. The listing even said it did. Not a deal breaker, but they shouldn’t “ bait and switch”.
customer_reviews.author: Seahawk

customer_reviews.title: Decent protection for an iPad mini.
customer_reviews.text: Sufficient protection for an iPad mini that my seven-year-old plays with constantly. There are tiny little tabs on the silicone cover which come untucked so I have to occasionally reinsert them so the soft cover doesn’t come undone.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not happy, sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, that I am disappointed. From day one the rubber clamps didn't stay inside. The front screen is sinked in too deep. I am sadly not happy with it compare to how it's described. Would rather replace with a solid hard case without any rubber clamos
customer_reviews.author: Mariusz W Bista Sr

customer_reviews.title: Will protect your ipad.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy ipad case. I haven't dropped the ipad to test it out but it provides a very good shell for the ipad and I don't worry now about moving around the house with the ipad. It is very good quality and even after my sons have been playing with the ipad for 2 months, the case still looks new. I was hesitant when I bought this but I'm glad I chose this to protect the ipad. Good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: I.M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. It fits well and seems to protect my iPad. It was easy to put on and they buttons still work great. My only issue is that the silicone cover over the charging port does not seal shut. Other than that, this is a great case for the price and it comes with a screen protector and stylus pen.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy E.

customer_reviews.title: Still in great shape. Extremely happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 7 months ago for an 8 yr old boy who has dropped his iPad a few times. Still in great shape. Extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful case
customer_reviews.text: Great for any age... This case has been wonderful my 10 year old that has dropped his $300 iPad 2 times and this case has protected it from being damaged. Has a nice kickstand in back witch makes it easy for him to watch his favorite shows and study for homework and tests. Come with a protection screen cover that has been wonderful for protecting from scratches. The best case for your mini iPads and comes in many colors.
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: Strong case, good fit, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sweet case. Fits perfectly and the kickstand is a nice feature. My young son is ROUGH on his IPad and thus far this thing has held up to the punishment. Was a but difficult to get on in the first place and I never could get all the rubber undercase to stay where it is supposed to, but that's pretty trivial.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Durable iPad Case
customer_reviews.text: We love our new iPad case. It is very durable. We bought it so that my nephew can use the iPad and we wouldn't have to worry about him breaking or cracking the screen. Love the exterior texture. I feel safe allowing any of the kids playing on the iPad now. They can have fun and we don't have to worry about cracked screens. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after a year!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the iPad I let my five-year old daughter use. It has been dropped on the floor multiple times and the screen never cracked. Case is still going strong after almost two years of abuse! Edit: as of May 4th, 2018 this case is still on our iPad Mini and there has been ZERO damage to the unit for all the abuse it has been put through.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. I don't bounce the iPad around too much, but the stand is nice, works well.
customer_reviews.author: BMDavis

customer_reviews.title: Well done...
customer_reviews.text: So I don't give a five unless there is NO room for improvement; however, I like this cover. It makes handling the iPad easier. It covers the charging port when not in use. Improvements... the outter shell it too soft... The prop stand does not move so it only props in landscape mode. Otherwise it is great and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product very durable for my 8 year old grandson. Just wished it had screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not come screen protector!
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is not bad for the price, however it stated it came with a screen protector and mine did not have one. This was very disappointing. I like the case itself but the reason i ordered in the first place was because it listed it with the screen protector, so i consider this false advertisement, i will be contacting the seller on this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Linda, AR

customer_reviews.title: Works but screen will still crack
customer_reviews.text: I've been through 2 iPad screens with this case, but no scratches anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what my husband was looking for in ipad protection! The hard shell is durable and the silicone is pleasant to hold. While we are still cautious, there is a definite level of comfort from job site to at home with the children. Also, this case is not too bulky which allows it to be easily tucked into a canvas satchel.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Collins

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: For me this cover makes the mini iPad a little bulkie and the protection screen makes the touch pad less sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Blackmoor Castle

customer_reviews.title: Impressive product !
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected, works well and as advertised ! Solid, designed well and works as advertised . No frills, just a good protection, great bang for your dollar!
customer_reviews.author: BKP830

customer_reviews.title: Working great in a commercial setting. . . ...
customer_reviews.text: My employees use these for their iPads that they carry around all day. I needed something cheap, but protective as you never know when someone will drop something on the concrete. So far, these have worked great and the price point is perfect. They have a nice shell around the iPad, and there is rubber around the plastic shell to give it some cushion. Like I said, working great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Joey D.

customer_reviews.title: Good case for the money
customer_reviews.text: Like: easy to install, love the pencil holder! Dislike: stand in back rattles when not being used, case isn’t has sturdy, very soft externally, but because of snug fit works well for me. Would recommend for daily use in the home, but would not use for heavy travel in airports, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This case has been abused badly for a very long time and looks and just as it did the day I received it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fits great,  looks good,  happy.
customer_reviews.text: It bulks up the device of course, but fits perfectly and looks good. Most importantly, it's made our iPad much more kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: DLen

customer_reviews.title: Not an otterbox, but does it's job for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My son cracked his iPad screen. We put this over the screen and now I don't have to worry about it cracking more. The outer rubber coating is a lot more flexible than an otterbox, but for the price, it does what we need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s holding up pretty nicely, the little stand works great although it’s a bit hard to pull it out. Other than that my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Little Raven

customer_reviews.title: Rugged durability and protection
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best cover. Great protection, easy to hold and the prop stand stays in place. I’d recommend it anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Protects well; screen protector has bubbles
customer_reviews.text: This cover does a great job of protecting my son's ipad from its inevitable bangs, bumps, and tumbles; however, the screen protector that is included is impossible to put on without creating lots of annoying little bubbles under the surface. Also, the protector is not super-easy/intuitive to get on the ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa O

customer_reviews.title: My favorite case ever
customer_reviews.text: This baby is tough and has probably stopped me from having a cracked screen multiple times. It's intelligently designed. That "hole" on the back (in the picture, you can see the Apple logo) makes a great spot for your fingers to hold the iPad. My only regret is that I couldn't find a similar product for my iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.author: Night Editor

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I wouldn't even give this one star. Had this protector on my iPad mini for less than a month and the screen is now cracked and can't be fixed according to Apple. Not very shock resistant. Now I'm out $400. Plus the screen protector bubbled like crazy no matter what we did. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put my iPad Mini (1st generation) into this protective case. I've been using it now for about a month. It's good. When buying this one should also purchase a screen protector since this protective case does not include one.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Keller

customer_reviews.title: iPad 2 case
customer_reviews.text: I had a Otter Box for my iPad and it worked great. This cover is very good as well. My grand kids have dropped my iPad 2 a few times and no damage. Additionally, there is a pull out piece on the back which allows me to stand the iPad up and read my books and watch movies.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't that great. The rubber is very thin and soft
customer_reviews.text: Quality isn't that great. The rubber is very thin and soft, almost like a rubberband material. The rubber case is always popping out of the plastic shell where it's supposed to lock in. The screen protector left air bubbles but you can't really see them when the iPad is on. This case is better than nothing. For $14 it's what I expected, good enough so my kids don't destroy their iPads. I'm sure it will protect the iPad's from kid height falls.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Great case if you don't need to remove it often.
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Secure, comfortable, strong. My only complaint is that it isn't the easiest to put on and take off. I use my iPad in aviation and have to take it out of the case to mount it in cockpit mount during flight. Kind of fussy to open up. And parts can get lost or broken easily when iPad is not in it.
customer_reviews.author: Archer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy to protect childs ipad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons ipad. It was ok, but I expected it to be more rugged. I would buy again if it were for my device, but not for my child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case but camera hole NOT CENTERED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case for my iPad mini 2 that my kids use often. I also got one for my larger iPad. I love how they fit and how durable they seem to be. It's only been 1 day but so far I like them very much. My only complaint is that the hole for the front camera is not centered. I may have gotten an odd ball. It doesn't cover the camera, but it still kind of bothers me that it's not centered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Had for 2 years, kids were rough on it, and broke. But worked fine before that.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Simms

customer_reviews.title: My IPad is now safe
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a expensive screen protector and one drop and $65 down the drain ☹️☹️☹️☹️ So I bought this and my worries are over about breaking my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: elefantaflaca

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold, protection on drops, and the stand is sturdier than other cases I’ve bought. Dislike that the stand goes out too far and you have to stop it at the right tilt, still works though, recommend it over others.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ribaudo

customer_reviews.title: ... much cheaper and the kickstand on this is much better. It is also important to note unlike the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as the otterbox on my wifes ipad but much cheaper and the kickstand on this is much better. It is also important to note unlike the otterbox this allows for a glass screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Protects iPad mini great!  Seller was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Received quickly for grandson’s iPad mini. Keeps the glass safe!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Topsky
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's a three layer. It's no otter box but I think it will do the job. I do like the stand that will hold the mini up for video watching. I can only give three stars as I'm only rating the product and not how it has held up. I will be putting on a more sturdy screen saver.
customer_reviews.author: SHOPAHOLIC

customer_reviews.title: but really wish I'd chosen a different case as there are so many good ones out there
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because it was an Amazon "Best Seller". I won't make that mistake again. This case is functional, but cheaply made. The hole for the camera is not even centered on the camera. The silicon "jacket" does not fit snugly and moves around on the outside of the hardshell. I will use this, but really wish I'd chosen a different case as there are so many good ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: txcooker

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, buying a second
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one year ago for 10 year old. One year later it is still in great condition and iPad mini is still pristine. Middle son is set to receive an iPad mini for this year as a Christmas gift and I have returned to purchase another protective case. Highly recommended for use with kids. With typical kid use it has proven itself time and time again. One negative, the rubber flaps that cover the charger area and volume buttons eventually tore off. They lasted 6-8 months and with it being used with kids I am not surprised. Will still be purchasing a second one for the newest addition to our Apple family.
customer_reviews.author: razzleDazzle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and surviving my 7 year old son!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my son, like my daughter, likes to throw the tablet around way too much. Ours is still in tact and he uses it all of the time. Especially the stand while at the table or his desk watching netflix or playing a game on his phone. I do recommend these sturdy cases.
customer_reviews.author: Jorgetastic

customer_reviews.title: Case broke. Ipad didn't.
customer_reviews.text: This case is not very sturdy. I have bought two and both have broken and needed taped back together. I gave two stars because while both cases have broken, the ipad did not. It did it's job but breaks down in the process. Looking for a different brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Miller

customer_reviews.title: The case at first was wonderful. It looked nice
customer_reviews.text: The case at first was wonderful. It looked nice, solid, and very protective. My 8 year old son dropped it on a carpeted floor and the screen cracked. I wish we would have spent the money on an otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I haven't dropped my ipad yet but have no doubt this would protect it if I did. Nice grippy surface insured that I never dropped it. Gel layer absorbs impact and hard layer protects. I really love it. Great access to all buttons, etc.
customer_reviews.author: TheDawnTreader

customer_reviews.title: It is great quality, easy to put on and is holding ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought an Ipad for my 7 year old son. Definitely wanted a cover for it so he wouldn't crack the glass. It is great quality, easy to put on and is holding up well. I would purchase again and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: This unit was easy for them to pull off
customer_reviews.text: My kids are very rough their toys and iDevices. This unit was easy for them to pull off, and the hard plastic backing, which isn't permanently attached, was removed almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: mmcwatters

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but not sturdy enough to handle a hard fall.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures looked great before purchasing. I was misjudged it. Makes my iPad bulky which I don’t mind at all for safety that I might drop it. However, plastic seems very brittle and not sturdy. It’s one hard fall away from shattering. Plastic mold that goes over it is not fitted properly and certain parts don’t even fit properly into the whole case. Thought my iPad would look cool with this case but it looks awful.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Case
customer_reviews.text: Solid case! Replace a life proof that finally fell apart. Other than not being waterproof it's pretty close to my 70$ Life proof. Phone has survived several drops and come out unscathed.
customer_reviews.author: am

customer_reviews.title: I bought another one and returned it since it was garbage. But this one is a winner
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first. I bought another one and returned it since it was garbage. But this one is a winner. It definitely is herky and has a stand that supports it in a viewing position . And as for the price its a winner they even include a plastic shield for the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Gay

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for his birthday for his Ipad and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R Schroyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son’s iPad. He loves the design and look of the protective cover and it has held up well so far. It was very easy to install. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: kkerriga

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for mini
customer_reviews.text: Very good build. Take your time to assemble, especially sealing (tucking silicone in back). Screen protector just so so, but free and unexpected. Order a better screen protector later but this case rocks.
customer_reviews.author: AreDub

customer_reviews.title: ... use it but the rest of the case is great. I've replaced the screen on my iPad at ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector bubbles so I don't use it but the rest of the case is great. I've replaced the screen on my iPad at least three times, now everything is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Techno Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for my husbands ipad mini. It was delivered quickly and was insanely easy to put on. Of course, my husband and kids have already dropped it and not a problem one with the case or ipad. I would recommend this to anyone that needs a protective case.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaFromSC

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t review products but this one is great! All round a great product it fit my iPad mini and held it snug. I was worried how it would fit, but it’s great no complaints
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Real good cover
customer_reviews.text: I like how soft the rubber is. Very comfortable to hold. Protects my son's iPad well each time he drops it, which is often. Cuter than I expected. He picked it out and likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Dystopian Stubble

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. Tried other cases with my autistic adult ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Tried other cases with my autistic adult child and had to replace the screen numerous times with other cases. Its going over a year now and no broken screens! Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Wright

customer_reviews.title: It was as expected. One caveat, don't mess ...
customer_reviews.text: It was as expected. One caveat, don't mess up the film for the screen. I didn't follow directions and had bubbles every place. Had to wind up buying a replacement film for the screen that cost more the original product. Shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: James Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Good if for adult or teen using this case
customer_reviews.text: Good if for adult or teen using this case.... Did not hold up for toddler...I would not recommend this. I went through 2 cracked screens already and a corner dent on iPad. I wish I had invested in the OtterBox....
customer_reviews.author: marlena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It survived my 6 year old and I pad did also, they should build stuff for the army
customer_reviews.author: Dominik Bazula

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Al good on this case, my only concern is the area around the charging port, it should be more stiffer, is too fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't protect my iPad from a fall
customer_reviews.text: Dropped my iPad from less than 3 feet up while in this case with a tempered glass screen cover and screen still broke. Not a good investment, didn't protect my iPad At all. Get an otterbox or a lifeproof case, this is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Saad Siddiqi

customer_reviews.title: But the case itself is great.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and item is as described. Feels durable. The screen protector is not attached as it appears in pictures and is not very durable. But the case itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The little flaps over the buttons are annoying to access because they try to fold back down
customer_reviews.text: The little flaps over the buttons are annoying to access because they try to fold back down, the stand leans back pretty far, and I wish that it would keep the iPad more upright for while I'm sitting at a table.
customer_reviews.author: Jg5

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection = a Happy Mom!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's ipad. So far it seems to offer good protection and he likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: T. B. S.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised to see how well this iPad cover works and looks. Even my wife commented how much she likes it. I particularly like the built in stand which eliminated the need for me to use a separate stand when using the iPad on a table top.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Fit perfectly and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fit perfectly and easy to install. I did use an Anker brand, tempered glass screen protector as well and the case still snapped together securely. Given the built-in convenience, the kickstand works fine both vertically and horizontally. Firm gripping edges and the additional weight is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Len J

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very sturdy case. Very well made. It fits securely
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Terry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case for iPad mini
customer_reviews.text: Great triple protection. Cover fits like a glove. No restrictions to buttons or ports. Camera lens is not blocked by the cover. Wish I had purchased this cover before my son dropped his iPad mini 2 and cracked the screen. That shouldn’t happen with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pratali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great case, a little bulky but it doesn't bother me. I bought it for protection and that's exactly what it does! It provides great grip, and I don't have to worry about accidentally dropping it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Item looked good and like a otter box. It broke after 2 weeks. I ordered a Otter box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Oi t is durable just to mani poeces and bulky
customer_reviews.author: Gennie Key

customer_reviews.title: Case did not fit.
customer_reviews.text: The case did not fit my ipad mini; it was a little too small. I would not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Librarian

customer_reviews.title: iPad case
customer_reviews.text: iPad Shock Case. 3 protective layers. Kick stand design for easy watching movies/tv on the iPad. Gray and Black skin. Anti-slip soft outer cover. Easy installation. Fits perfect and protects the iPad well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for a 10 year old boy that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case for a 10 year old boy that is rough with things! He loves the case along with his Ipad Mini! So far, hasn't dropped it! The stand is perfect when he is watching videos or movies.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolea1234

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong
customer_reviews.text: every time I try to charge my ipad the silicone part come off. I mean the grey part that is next to the charger part. Its annoying, I think my product came damaged. Other than that is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Urresta

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kickstand is a little flimsy but overall this was the most reasonably priced case for my iPad mini with retina display. Updated a year and a half later: kickstand ended up breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Pal

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: The rubber outing shell is to flimsy. Comes off too easily. I recommend the SUPCASE Heavy Duty one. It's called the Beetle. More money but better quality. Only drawback is no stand.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M. Sailors

customer_reviews.title: but it's easy to push back on and doesn't effect usage very ...
customer_reviews.text: the rubber part of the three layers is alittle lose and sometimes comes detached, but it's easy to push back on and doesn't effect usage very much. this is the second case i bought for an additional iPad i bought and i've been ever happy with both. it's cheap, it works, and it comes in many different colors. i will definitely buy a third one if i buy another iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did so thinking I would be better protected than the one that was on there
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPad 3, iPad 4, and iPad mini 2. I purchased this for my mini 2. I purchased a similar one without the stand for iPad 4. I did so thinking I would be better protected than the one that was on there. Well both of the ipad 4 and mini 2 are cracked. The iPad 3 had a different case and is still fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: For the price it isn't bad..
customer_reviews.text: For the price it isn't bad... The flippy tabs for the charger port and the headphone jack suck and didn't lock into place. So I cut them off... F it it was $13.00
customer_reviews.author: j digital

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Tha plastic was cheap and did not meet our expectations
customer_reviews.author: A.Grimm

customer_reviews.title: but very sturdy. The screen cover is not very good
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive cover, but very sturdy. The screen cover is not very good... But I didn't even know it was included. The item description did not state it came with a screen saver. Overall great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: John Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mechanics mini clean and safe
customer_reviews.text: My mechanic husband is so glad to have this case on the mini he uses at the shop. It keeps it clean and safe.
customer_reviews.author: wp

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking, case poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: The hard plastic case fits tightly however the rubber surround is not cut well. It keeps popping out in various places when just holding the case. Although inexpensive I will be ordering something else of better quality. If you want something cheap that has an ok fit this will do. However not for me.
customer_reviews.author: LQ

customer_reviews.title: Protective case for iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty protective, only complaint I have is the rubber comes off pretty easy, much easier than the OtterBox. Other than that, I'm pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Spikes

customer_reviews.title: Check your model, you might get lucky
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my current iPad though it said it would. Didn't realize that much difference in iPad designs. Gave it to my girlfriend and it fit hers perfectly. I give it 2 stars for the description when purchased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: External bumper weak
customer_reviews.text: The plastic internal case has held up fine, but the external bumper guard has torn in multiple places and the stand broke off right away
customer_reviews.author: Ja

product_meta.title: Topsky 2877893 Shock-Absorption Three Layer Armor Defender Full Body Protective Case for iPad Mini, Mini 2 , Mini 3, Mini Retina - Grey Black
feature_bullets: Easy to convert Kick Stand Design
Anti-slip silicone soft outer layer case provides great handling and extra cushion for impact protection
Simplified installation, protects from scratches and is easy to clean
